languages.text: "Плевать на Императора и его слуг! Мы не в Империуме, здесь выживание требует... моральной гибкости".
"To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."
languages.original_text: "Плевать на Императора и его слуг! Мы не в Империуме, здесь выживание требует... моральной гибкости".

traits.locale_text: "To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."
"To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."
"To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."
"To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."
"To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."

languages.text: “去他的帝皇和什么仆人吧！这里可不是帝国！如果打算活下来的话，我们就必须……随机应变才行。”
languages.original_text: "To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."

traits.locale_text: “去他的帝皇和什么仆人吧！这里可不是帝国！如果打算活下来的话，我们就必须……随机应变才行。”

languages.text: 「皇帝もその従僕たちも関係ない！ここは帝国ではない！生き残るためには…柔軟に対応しなければ」
languages.original_text: "To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝もその従僕たちも関係ない！ここは帝国ではない！生き残るためには…柔軟に対応しなければ」

languages.text: «¡Al vacío con el Emperador y sus sirvientes! ¡Esto no es el Imperium! Si queremos sobrevivir, tenemos que mostrarnos... flexibles con nuestras opciones».
languages.original_text: "To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."

traits.locale_text: «¡Al vacío con el Emperador y sus sirvientes! ¡Esto no es el Imperium! Si queremos sobrevivir, tenemos que mostrarnos... flexibles con nuestras opciones».

languages.text: « Je me moque bien de l'Empereur et de ses serviteurs ! Nous ne sommes pas dans l'Imperium ! Si nous voulons avoir une chance de survivre, nous devons nous montrer... flexibles. »
languages.original_text: "To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."

traits.locale_text: « Je me moque bien de l'Empereur et de ses serviteurs ! Nous ne sommes pas dans l'Imperium ! Si nous voulons avoir une chance de survivre, nous devons nous montrer... flexibles. »

languages.text: "In die Leere mit dem Imperator und seinen Dienern! Hier ist nicht das Imperium. Wenn wir überleben wollen, müssen wir ... bei unseren Entscheidungen flexibel sein."
languages.original_text: "To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."

traits.locale_text: "In die Leere mit dem Imperator und seinen Dienern! Hier ist nicht das Imperium. Wenn wir überleben wollen, müssen wir ... bei unseren Entscheidungen flexibel sein."

languages.text: "İmparator ve hizmetkârlarının uçsuza kadar yolu var! Burası İmparatorluk değil! Sağ kalmak istiyorsak seçimlerimizde daha esnek olmak durumundayız."
languages.original_text: "To the void with the Emperor and his servants! This is not the Imperium! If we hope to survive, we must be... flexible in our choices."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator ve hizmetkârlarının uçsuza kadar yolu var! Burası İmparatorluk değil! Sağ kalmak istiyorsak seçimlerimizde daha esnek olabilmeliyiz."
